events.message: I placed my order two weeks ago but it still hasn't arrived. The tracking number doesn't show any updates, and I'm worried about the delay.
The system has categorized this case as Delivery Delay based on keywords related to late shipment and tracking issues mentioned by the customer.
An agent has been assigned to handle the customer's case regarding the delay in delivery and tracking problems.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I’m sorry to hear your order hasn’t arrived yet. I’ll be happy to help you track it down.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking number you received? This will help me check the status with the carrier.
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the tracking number is ZX987654321. The tracking info hasn't been updated for over a week.
Thank you for the information. I checked with the shipping carrier and there appears to be a delay due to weather issues. I will request expedited shipping at no extra cost.
I appreciate you looking into this and providing an expedited shipping option. That would help a lot, thank you!
We have updated your shipping method to expedited service, and you should receive your package within the next two days. We apologize again for the inconvenience.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your order and everything is in good condition. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
The case has been closed following confirmation of delivery and customer satisfaction. Thank you for contacting support.
